news.title: Seven rare Pharaonic-era artifacts found in Kafr El-Sheikh

news.description: Archaeologists have discovered seven rare artifacts from the Pharaonic era in Kafr El-Sheikh. The discovery includes pottery, jewelry, and tools dating back thousands of years.
